snippet: Managers, of either sex, tended to hire men over women when the criteria was math skills, even when women had measurably better math skills, according to a paper published Monday.
abstract: Managers, of either sex, tended to hire men over women when the criteria was math skills, even when women had measurably better math skills, according to a paper published Monday.

headline.main: Study: Women Who Can Do Math Still Don't Get Hired
